messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Lets uuuuuuuh... Have a safe day. Don't die. no murder. thanks

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Please do your part to keep the station clean, we don't have a janitor so it's everyone's job

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Primary Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Quartermaster's Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Papa Craunch's Crunchtime Playpen, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Gateway.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: No swearing on my good christian station.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to [REDACTED], a horde of wire eating mammals have descended into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Art Supply Storage.
